abstract: “Double Down: Game Change 2012,” by Mark Halperin and John Heilemann, is set for fall 2013 publication. HBO has optioned the rights, as it did with the authors’ earlier work on the 2008 presidential race, which was turned into a movie.
snippet: “Double Down: Game Change 2012,” by Mark Halperin and John Heilemann, is set for fall 2013 publication. HBO has optioned the rights, as it did with the authors’ earlier work on the 2008 presidential race, which was turned into a movie.
lead_paragraph: 5:14 p.m. | Updated Mark Halperin and John Heilemann, the political journalists behind the best seller “Game Change,” about the 2008 presidential campaign, will publish a book about the just-concluded election under the title “Double Down: Game Change 2012,” Penguin Press announced on Tuesday.

headline.main: Penguin to Publish 2012 Campaign Book From Authors of ‘Game Change’
